energy.usef.agr.repository

Class ConnectionForecastSnapshotRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.agr.repository.ConnectionForecastSnapshotRepository

  • public class ConnectionForecastSnapshotRepository
extends Object
    Repository class in charge of the 'database' operations related to the ConnectionForecastSnapshot entities. The serialization format behind this repository might not be a database (can be JSON file).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionForecastSnapshotRepository() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionForecastSnapshot findConnectionForecastSnapshot(String connectionEntityAddress, org.joda.time.LocalDate ptuDate, Integer ptuIndex)
      Finds the ConnectionForecastSnapshot for the given connection and the specified ptu date and ptu index.
      List<ConnectionForecastSnapshot> findConnectionForecastSnapshots(org.joda.time.LocalDate period)
      Finds all the connection forecast snapshots and order them by PTU_DATE, PTU_INDEX and then CONNECTION_ENTITY_ADDRESS.
      void serializeConnectionForecastSnapshots(Collection<ConnectionForecastSnapshot> connectionForecastSnapshots)
      Serialize a collection of ConnectionForecastSnaphosts.

      • ConnectionForecastSnapshotRepository

    • Method Detail

      • findConnectionForecastSnapshot

        public ConnectionForecastSnapshot findConnectionForecastSnapshot(String connectionEntityAddress,
                                                                 org.joda.time.LocalDate ptuDate,
                                                                 Integer ptuIndex)
        Finds the ConnectionForecastSnapshot for the given connection and the specified ptu date and ptu index.
        Parameters:
        connectionEntityAddress - String entity address of the connection.
        ptuDate - LocalDate period of the related ptu.
        ptuIndex - Integer index of the related ptu.
        Returns:
        a ConnectionForecastSnapshot or null.

      • findConnectionForecastSnapshots

        public List<ConnectionForecastSnapshot> findConnectionForecastSnapshots(org.joda.time.LocalDate period)
        Finds all the connection forecast snapshots and order them by PTU_DATE, PTU_INDEX and then CONNECTION_ENTITY_ADDRESS.
        Parameters:
        period - LocalDate the period of the snapshots
        Returns:
        a List of ConnectionForecastSnapshot entities

      • serializeConnectionForecastSnapshots

        public void serializeConnectionForecastSnapshots(Collection<ConnectionForecastSnapshot> connectionForecastSnapshots)
        Serialize a collection of ConnectionForecastSnaphosts. This method will erase all the existing content in the file specified in the configuration.
        Parameters:
        connectionForecastSnapshots - Collection of ConnectionForecastSnapshot.
